original_text: For seven days no yeast is to be found in your houses. And anyone, whether foreigner or native-born, who eats anything with yeast in it must be cut off from the community of Israel.
korean_text: 이레 동안은 누룩이 너희 집에서 발견되지 아니하도록 하라 무릇 유교물을 먹는 자는 타국인이든지 본국에서 난 자든지를 막론하고 이스라엘 회중에서 끊어지리니

sentences.original_text: no yeast is to be found in your houses
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 집에서 누룩을 찾아서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: who eats anything with yeast in it
must be cut off from the community of Israel
